column2: IDEA-26855 Move system and config directories in Windows under %LOCALAPPDATA%

column3: The new location of the system and config directories is under %LOCALAPPDATA%\Company Name\Product Name\N.M, where N and M are the major and minor version.

Sorry for the later reply.
We've planned the change for IDEA 2020.1, along with a similar one for Linux.
Move system and config directories in Windows under %LOCALAPPDATA%
